articles.description: Microsoft Lens can extract text from an image, copy a table and automatically save contact details by pointing the camera at a business card.
articles.content: Microsoft has today announced that it is renaming the acclaimed document-scanning and enhancement app – Office Lens – to Microsoft Lens. Aside from a new name, there is now a fresh logo to boot as we… [+1683 chars]

articles.title: Google announces it's closing its Stadia game studio, still committed to cloud gaming - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The company realizes that creating high-scale games takes years and significant investments and it turns out Google wasn’t really committed to all that
articles.content: When Google first announced its Stadia cloud gaming platform, it took a huge risk that would change the way people play games. It originally planned to release original games developed by Stadias in-… [+2171 chars]

articles.title: Possible iPhone SE 3 design shown off through concept renders - 91mobiles
articles.description: iPhone SE 3 or iPhone SE Plus concept renders imagine a phone with a punch-hole display, OLED screen, and a side fingerprint sensor.
